resources.string:
Enable/Disable mobile data/wifi using command prompt:

Is you phone locked (like "too much pattern attempts" :)) and you internet connection is turned off?

Now enable mobile data using adb shell command.

  1. Configure adb into your computer. 
  2. Start your command prompt and fire command:

adb shell am broadcast -a yp.data.handlebroadcast -n yp.data.handle/.DataChangeReceiver --ez "wifiEnable" "true"  --ez "mobileDataEnable" "true"
